value.title: StarCraft 2: RELENTLESS Terran Aggression! (Classic vs GuMiho)
value.excerpt: Awesome match of Terran versus Protoss played at the professional level of StarCraft 2. This is the first game I cast featuring Classic, after he came back to StarCraft 2. value.title: StarCraft 2: SpeCial's EXTREME SLOW PUSH  Vs Has! (Best-of-5)
value.excerpt: Fun series of professional Protoss versus Terran in StarCraft 2. While Has is known for his very aggressive playstyle, it is primarily SpeCial that decides the pacing of this best-of-5 series. value.title: StarCraft 2: STORM DROPS! (MaNa vs SpeCial)
value.excerpt: Amazing game of professional Terran versus Protoss in StarCraft 2. This game is a constant back-and-forth between some of the best players outside of South Korea. One of the highlights are multiple storm drops that the Protoss player executes with a Warp Prism and several High Templar with Psionic Storm.

value.title: StarCraft 2: WHAT YEAR IS IT?! (DRG vs SpeCial)
